document_data.name: Helvenblade House
document_data.mainbody: '''Helvenblade House''' was a country estate owned by the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble]] [[Silmerhelve]] family of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|7}}
document_data.Location: It was located west of the [[Long Road]] at the border of [[Kryptgarden Forest]], northwest of [[Westbridge]].
document_data.Structure: The estate comprised the manor house, stables, two hunting lodges, and a third guest lodge. It featured a bountiful vegetable garden and vast hunting grounds.
document_data.History: As of the early 1490s [[DR]], the Silmerhelve family visited Helvenblade House about a half a dozen times a year.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Local legend stated that Helvenblade House was protected by what was perceived as the Silmerhelve family ghost. This guardian spirit was in fact the [[bronze dragon]] [[Umsheryoth]], a long-time ally of the Waterdhavian family.
document_data.Inhabitants: The noble estate was maintained by a staff of caretakers that lived on the grounds year-round.
